knimeNode.name: KronaTaxon
knimeNode.shortDescription: Krona Tools importing NCBI Taxonomy IDs

fullDescription.option: Include a wedge for queries with no hits.
Combine data from each file, rather than creating separate datasets within the chart.
Column of input files to use as query ID. Required if magnitude files are specified.
Column of input files to use as taxonomy ID.
Column of input files to use as score.
Column of input files to use as magnitude. If magnitude files are specified, their magnitudes will override those in this column.
Maximum depth of wedges to include in the chart.
Allow assignments to taxa with ranks labeled 'no rank' (instead of moving up to parent).

URL of Krona resources to use instead of bundling them with the chart (e.g. 'http://krona.sourceforge.net'). Reduces size of charts and allows updates, though charts will not work without access to this URL.

Url to send query IDs to (instead of listing them) for each wedge. The query IDs will be sent as a comma separated list in the POST variable 'queries', with the current dataset index (from 0) in the POST variable 'dataset'.

knimeNode.interactiveView: The generic view executing the entered JavaScript.

ports.inPort: Input files that contains taxonomy IDs. [kraken,*]
Path to directory containing a taxonomy database to use. [*,opt.]
ports.outPort: Output HTML file that contains Krona plot. [html]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of KtImportTaxonomy.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of KtImportTaxonomy. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
